He who maintains the soundness of [his] right [..........].
He who maintains the soundness of his left [....], he will be able to foresee the invisible.
Chapter: On the Maintenance of the Beard.
He who trims his beard [on the right side, he will ..........].
[He who trims his beard] on the left side, his speech will be improved [...].
[.......] will last long [...................].
[......] his [....] will be healthy [...] and handsome [.......].
Chapter: On the Fitness of the Two Temples.
He who maintains the soundness of his right temple, the full moon will draw people closer to him.
He who maintains the soundndess of his left temple, his body will be healthy, and his eyes will stay firm.
Chapter: On the Fitness of the Two Ears.
He who maintains the soundness of his right ear, his senses will be at ease and [his ...] will be smooth [...].
